subject: Automobile Racing
Daytona 500 (Auto Race)
Economic Conditions and Trends
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Change has come to Nascar in 2009, not by popular demand but by economic necessity. And it has cut deeply into the fabric of the sport.
snippet: Change has come to Nascar in 2009, not by popular demand but by economic necessity. And it has cut deeply into the fabric of the sport.
